description:
A man looks for a box of treasure at a bridge. A couple is dealing with a violent governor. An old man who loves to drink finds a skull in a field.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asamutsu Bridge / The Strong Wife / The Flower-Watching Ghost
Asamutsubashi / Kairiki no Nyoubou / Ohanami Yuurei
朝六橋 / 怪力の女房 / お花見ゆうれい
